    "size": 17783,
    "content": "# Hypernet Financial Projections (5 Years)
## Conservative, Realistic, and Ambitious Scenarios

**Prepared for:** Investor presentations and internal planning
**Created:** February 2026
**Currency:** USD

---

## Executive Summary

**Year 1:** Break-even at 50K users
**Year 3:** $120M ARR, profitable
**Year 5:** $2B+ ARR, IPO-ready

**Path to profitability:** 18 months
**TAM:** $2 Trillion (Personal computing + AI services + VR/AR)
**Business model:** 4 revenue streams (subscription, AI marketplace, enterprise, platform)

---

## Revenue Streams (4 Models)

### Stream 1: Consumer Subscription

**Pricing tiers:**
- **Free:** 10GB storage, basic features, ad-supported
- **Premium:** $9.99/month - Unlimited storage, VR features, AI marketplace access
- **Family:** $24.99/month - Up to 6 members, shared features
- **Lifetime:** $299 one-time (promotional, limited)

**Assumptions:**
- 10% free → premium conversion (industry standard)
- 20% premium → family upgrade
- Average LTV: $500 over 4 years

### Stream 2: AI Data Marketplace

**How it works:**
- AI companies pay users $5-50/month for data access
- Hypernet takes 30% platform fee
- Users keep 70%

**Example per user:**
- OpenAI: $10/month for conversation context
- Anthropic: $8/month for document access
- Google: $12/month for photo metadata
- User receives: $21/month
- Hypernet receives: $9/month (30% of $30)

**Assumptions:**
- 50% of premium users opt into AI marketplace
- Average AI company payment: $30/month total
- Hypernet cut: $9/month per participating user

### Stream 3: Enterprise (B2B)

**Target:** Companies needing employee data management

**Pricing:**
- **SMB:** $50/user/year (10-100 employees)
- **Mid-market:** $100/user/year (100-1,000 employees)
- **Enterprise:** $200/user/year (1,000+ employees)

**Features:**
- Unified employee data management
- GDPR/compliance tools
- Company-wide search
- Admin controls
- SSO integration

**Assumptions:**
- Launch Year 2
- 5% of user base converts to enterprise licenses

### Stream 4: Platform/Developer Fees

**Marketplace for third-party apps:**
- Hypernet takes 15-30% of app sales (like App Store)
- API access fees for developers
- Data export services

**Assumptions:**
- Launch Year 3
- 10% of revenue in Year 5

---

## Year 1: Foundation ($2M Revenue)

### Q1 (Months 1-3): Post-Funding Setup
**Users:** 0 → 5,000
**Revenue:** $15K
**Burn rate:** $150K/month

**Activities:**
- Hire team (2 senior engineers)
- Build MVP beyond demo
- Launch closed beta
- Refine product-market fit

**Costs:**
- Salaries: $300K (2 engineers × $150K)
- Infrastructure: $20K (AWS, tools)
- Marketing: $50K (beta launch)
- Operations: $80K (legal, accounting, office)
- **Total:** $450K

**Revenue:**
- 5,000 users × 10% conversion = 500 premium
- 500 × $10/month × 3 months = $15K

### Q2 (Months 4-6): Public Beta
**Users:** 5,000 → 20,000
**Revenue:** $120K
**Burn rate:** $150K/month

**Activities:**
- Public beta launch
- PR push (TechCrunch, The Verge)
- Quest store submission
- First AI marketplace partnerships

**Costs:** $450K (same as Q1)

**Revenue:**
- 20,000 users × 10% conversion = 2,000 premium
- 2,000 × $10/month × 3 months = $60K (subscription)
- 1,000 AI marketplace users × $9/month × 3 months = $27K
- **Total:** $87K

### Q3 (Months 7-9): Scale
**Users:** 20,000 → 50,000
**Revenue:** $400K
**Burn rate:** $180K/month

**Activities:**
- Hire 2 more engineers
- Marketing ramp up
- Apple Vision Pro support
- Enterprise pilot programs

**Costs:**
- Salaries: $450K (4 engineers, 1 designer)
- Infrastructure: $40K (scaling)
- Marketing: $150K (growth)
- Operations: $100K
- **Total:** $740K (2.5 months burn)

**Revenue:**
- 50,000 × 15% conversion = 7,500 premium
- 7,500 × $10/month × 3 months = $225K
- 3,750 AI marketplace × $9/month × 3 months = $101K
- Family plans: $50K
- **Total:** $376K

### Q4 (Months 10-12): Profitability Path
**Users:** 50,000 → 100,000
**Revenue:** $1M
**Burn rate:** $200K/month

**Activities:**
- Hire product manager
- Expand marketing
- Series A preparation
- Hit 100K users (milestone)

**Costs:**
- Salaries: $600K (5 engineers, 1 PM, 1 designer)
- Infrastructure: $60K
- Marketing: $300K (aggressive growth)
- Operations: $140K
- **Total:** $1.1M (5.5 months burn)

**Revenue:**
- 100,000 × 20% conversion = 20,000 premium
- 20,000 × $10/month × 3 months = $600K
- 10,000 AI marketplace × $9/month × 3 months = $270K
- Family plans: $120K
- Enterprise pilots: $50K
- **Total:** $1.04M

### Year 1 Totals
**Users:** 100,000 (20,000 paying)
**Revenue:** $2.04M
**Expenses:** $2.74M
**Net:** -$700K (covered by $500K seed + revenue)
**Burn:** Down to $50K/month by end of year

---

## Year 2: Growth ($25M Revenue)

### Key Milestones
- Reach 500,000 total users (100,000 paying)
- Launch enterprise offering
- Series A funding ($10M at $50M valuation)
- Expand team to 25 people
- Achieve profitability in Q4

### Revenue Breakdown
**Subscription:** $15M
- 100,000 premium × $10/month × 12 = $12M
- 10,000 family × $25/month × 12 = $3M

**AI Marketplace:** $6M
- 50,000 users × $9/month × 12 = $5.4M

**Enterprise:** $4M
- 100 companies × 50 employees × $80/year = $4M

**Total Revenue:** $25M

### Expenses
**Team:** $6M (25 people average $240K fully loaded)
**Infrastructure:** $2M (AWS, servers, bandwidth)
**Marketing:** $8M (user acquisition, CAC ~$80)
**R&D:** $4M (product development)
**Operations:** $3M (legal, finance, office)
**Total Expenses:** $23M

**Net Income:** +$2M (profitable in Q4)
**Cash on hand:** $12M (Series A + profits)

---

## Year 3: Scale ($120M Revenue)

### Key Milestones
- Reach 2M total users (400K paying)
- Launch platform/developer marketplace
- International expansion (EU, Asia)
- Team grows to 75 people
- Series B funding ($50M at $300M valuation)

### Revenue Breakdown
**Subscription:** $55M
- 350,000 premium × $10/month × 12 = $42M
- 40,000 family × $25/month × 12 = $12M
- International: $1M

**AI Marketplace:** $35M
- 200,000 users × $9/month × 12 = $21.6M
- Higher tier AI deals: $13.4M

**Enterprise:** $25M
- 1,000 companies × 100 employees × $250/year = $25M

**Platform fees:** $5M
- Third-party apps, API access

**Total Revenue:** $120M

### Expenses
**Team:** $22M (75 people, $293K average)
**Infrastructure:** $12M (2M users, lots of data)
**Marketing:** $35M (aggressive growth, CAC ~$60)
**R&D:** $15M (new features, AI)
**Operations:** $10M (international, legal)
**Total Expenses:** $94M

**Net Income:** +$26M (22% margin)
**Cash:** $88M (Series B + profits)

---

## Year 4: Dominance ($500M Revenue)

### Key Milestones
- Reach 8M users (1.6M paying)
- Market leader in VR productivity
- Profitable unicorn ($1B+ valuation)
- IPO preparation begins
- Team: 200 people

### Revenue Breakdown
**Subscription:** $220M
- 1,400,000 premium × $10/month × 12 = $168M
- 150,000 family × $25/month × 12 = $45M
- International: $7M

**AI Marketplace:** $150M
- 800,000 users × $9/month × 12 = $86.4M
- Enterprise AI deals: $63.6M

**Enterprise:** $100M
- 5,000 companies × 150 employees × $133/year = $100M

**Platform:** $30M
- Thriving developer ecosystem

**Total Revenue:** $500M

### Expenses
**Team:** $70M (200 people, $350K average)
**Infrastructure:** $50M (8M users)
**Marketing:** $150M (scale, CAC ~$50)
**R&D:** $50M (innovation, AI)
**Operations:** $30M (IPO prep, international)
**Total Expenses:** $350M

**Net Income:** +$150M (30% margin)
**Cash:** $238M

---

## Year 5: IPO ($2.1B Revenue)

### Key Milestones
- 30M users (6M paying)
- IPO at $10B+ valuation
- International dominance
- AI partnerships with all major companies
- Team: 500 people

### Revenue Breakdown
**Subscription:** $850M
- 5,000,000 premium × $10/month × 12 = $600M
- 600,000 family × $25/month × 12 = $180M
- International: $70M

**AI Marketplace:** $700M
- 3,000,000 users × $9/month × 12 = $324M
- Premium AI partnerships: $376M

**Enterprise:** $450M
- 20,000 companies × 200 employees × $112/year = $450M

**Platform:** $100M
- Mature developer ecosystem

**Total Revenue:** $2.1B

### Expenses
**Team:** $200M (500 people, $400K average)
**Infrastructure:** $200M (30M users, massive scale)
**Marketing:** $500M (global domination)
**R&D:** $300M (next-gen features)
**Operations:** $150M (public company costs)
**Total Expenses:** $1.35B

**Net Income:** +$750M (36% margin)
**Market Cap:** $10-15B (10-20x revenue)

---

## Unit Economics

### Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
**Year 1:** $100/user (early, expensive)
**Year 3:** $60/user (efficient channels)
**Year 5:** $40/user (organic + paid mix)

### Lifetime Value (LTV)
**Average subscription duration:** 4 years
**Annual revenue per user:**
- Subscription: $120/year
- AI marketplace: $108/year (if opted in)
- Total: $228/year average

**LTV:** $912 (4 years × $228)
**LTV/CAC ratio:** 15:1 by Year 3 (excellent)

### Churn Rate
**Year 1:** 8%/month (high, finding PMF)
**Year 3:** 3%/month (industry standard)
**Year 5:** 2%/month (best in class)

### Gross Margin
**Year 1:** 60% (infrastructure cost
